error.openai.apiKeyMissing: OpenAI API key not configured. Please set OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable or configure docTranslate.openaiApiKey in settings.
error.anthropic.apiKeyMissing: Anthropic API key not configured. Please set ANTHROPIC_API_KEY environment variable or configure docTranslate.anthropicApiKey in settings.
error.gemini.apiKeyMissing: Gemini API key not configured. Please set GEMINI_API_KEY environment variable or configure docTranslate.geminiApiKey in settings.
error.openai.noContent: No content in OpenAI API response
error.anthropic.unexpectedType: Unexpected response type from Anthropic API
error.gemini.noContent: No text in Gemini API response
